example: The city decided to ban plastic bags to protect the environment.
The banning of certain pesticides has helped local wildlife recover.
Students can benefit from participating in extracurricular activities.
We need to buy more bin bags for the kitchen.
Products made from plant materials can biodegrade naturally.
Regular exercise can boost your energy levels.
It was brave of the climber to attempt the difficult route.
Take a deep breath and relax before you start.
Travel can help to broaden your horizons.
